title: Keeping Your Sites Lite, Right?
content: The internet has been an amazing invention, bringing all sorts of media to your desktop or mobile device. But as the years have gone by, perhaps it's been a bit too much? Maybe you'd like a stripped down and more bandwidth friendly version of some sites? Say no more friend! Shepherd made a post about news sites that do that, based on their earlier AskMetafilter question. Come bask in the words!
author: Brandon Blatcher
